findings.title: Application Data can be Backed up android:allowBackup flag is missing.
findings.description: By default [android:allowBackup] flag is set to true, allowing anyone to backup your application data via adb. It also allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

findings.title: Service (ro. ing. android. notification. InstanceIDListenerService) is not Protected. An intent-filter exists.
findings.description: A  Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Service is explicitly exported.
findings.recommendation: It is recommended to set the protection level to signature, so only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
